name: Super Cool
description:
SuperCool is a twin stick shooter arcade game inspired by Super Hot. 

Time moves when you move and is slowed down when you don't move. 

CONTROLS

mouse movement : aim

mouse left click: pick weapon/use weapon

 mouse right click: throw weapon

WASD: movement

P : pause

R: restart

+++ CHANGELOG v 0.4 +++

- Improved melee combat 
- Hats added :)

++++++++++++++++++
